Class AbstractLoggerFacade<T extends LoggerFacade>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.mnl.osgi.lf4osgi.core.AbstractLoggerFacade<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LoggerFacade
    Direct Known Subclasses:

    public abstract class AbstractLoggerFacade<T extends LoggerFacade>
extends Object
implements LoggerFacade
    A base class for logger facades.

      • AbstractLoggerFacade

        public AbstractLoggerFacade(LoggerGroup group,
                            String name)
        Instantiates a new logger facade.

        A new logger is automatically registered with the LoggerFacadeManager.

        Parameters:
        group - the logger group
        name - the name

        public abstract void loggerFactoryUpdated(LoggerFactory factory)

        Parameters:
